item.title: Building my First Project: Numbers Facts Machine
item.description: UPDATE: I finally managed to host the app thanks to The Shalvah Check out the app here This is the first ever project I completed and I got the inspiration from Brad Traversy YouTube video. I decided to add my own features and include options for both year and date request. The project is based on the Numbers API where the data is gotten from. The documentation on the usage of the API is pretty straightforward and Itâ€™s a free API.
